attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more immigrants are coming to Great Britain every year as the prospect of a free ride appeals to them, Why are we paying for them to come here. We would not get benefits if we were to go to their country. This is why taxes are rising and house prices are also rising due to demand from immigrants, The british are now the minority here. Help us have our say.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
